turn.0: ELI5: How does an electrical wave between neurons become conscious thought?
turn.1: If materialism is true then consciousness must be a direct product of matter. It could be that a sufficiently complex organization of matter leads to consciousness (self aware matter) as an emergent phenomena in our universe.
turn.2: Maybe ELI3?   Do you mean that, for instance, my thoughts when writing this comment are literally matter in the universe?
turn.3: Yes, I don't see how they could be anything other than matter considering everything is made of matter.
turn.5: Yes, anti-matter has been isolated and measured. It is part of the energy of the universe.
